meanings.definition: Used to express sudden realization or discovery.
meanings.sent1: Aha! I finally found my missing sock under the bed.
meanings.sent2: She exclaimed 'aha!' when she solved the puzzle.
meanings.sent3: Aha! I see now why the chicken crossed the road.
meanings.sent4: The answer to the riddle was like an 'aha' moment for him.
meanings.sent5: His 'aha' moment came when he connected the dots.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of triumph or satisfaction.
meanings.sent1: Aha! I won the game against my brother.
meanings.sent2: The team shouted 'aha!' after scoring the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: Aha! I finally beat my high score in the game.
meanings.sent4: Her 'aha' echoed through the room as she completed the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The 'aha' of victory filled his heart with joy.
